name: Spellbound Party
overview: Spellbound Party offers a fun learning experience for the whole family. Take on friends and family in the ultimate spelling showdown in a crazy game show environment. Your host will take you on a rollercoaster ride of fun as you go head to head with up to 3 players in 'Party' mode. To give learning a competitive edge players are rewarded more points for choosing difficult words to spell. Children can also take on adults in Spellbound Generations mode where the spelling level is determined by the players' age. Features: * Choose from 8 avatars as well as slots for guest players * 4 Single Player modes: Championships, Training, Mini-Games, List of Shame * Up to 4 players can battle it out in the multiplayer Party Mode * Spellbound Generations mode offers a handicapping system allowing kids to compete against adults
